data.what_is: m-savvy is Marketing Software developed based on over 25 years of experience in the marketing industry. Try it out and receive your unfair advantage
data.product_description: m-savvy is Marketing Software developed based on over 25 years of experience in the marketing industry. Try it out and receive your unfair advantage

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about m-savvy?
There is no about how much they have redeveloped the website. The site is still under redevelopment and there is no such recent activity. It's a New Zealand-based marketing development tool but as of now, it does not work at all.

What do you dislike about m-savvy?
It does not show any recent activity or update about when the tool will be available. There is no Contact Page where we can determine the process of redevelopment of the website.

Recommendations to others considering m-savvy:
There are many other tools available globally that are far better than m-savvy like Google Analytics, MixPanel, SEMrush, etc.
I don't recommend m-savvy.

What problems is m-savvy solving and how is that benefiting you?
m-savvy is a Marketing Database and Analytical Tool which can be used to understand the plan of the investment of marketing's human and financial resources but as of now m-savvy is under redevelopment and cannot be used until it will finish its redevelopment.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about m-savvy?
The UX/UI is super user friendly, it organizes everything you need and, for someone like me, it's really easy to manuever. I'm not sure how we'd operate properly without it!

What do you dislike about m-savvy?
n/a. I don't have any personal dislikes about this product.

What problems is m-savvy solving and how is that benefiting you?
It keeps track of all filed & needed data
